title: Hey can any Red clarify to us about old legendary skins VU like Nunu Bot?
body:
These skins deserve to have upgrade in texture and particles. Or have their price reduced. come on is that dificult to answer us?

ive asked this question couple of times but nobody gives a straight answer. I know they are old and at that time Riot had a different quality for those tier skins but as times passed on they became useless and unfun.. but the worst is that they are still sold as 1820 rp skins. It just doesnt follow accordingly with the tier skin rules no??



Would you give them updates dear rito?
{{champion:20}}

replies.body: At this time, we don't have plans to update older legendary skins.

Question: with all the absolutely awful splashes from 2009/2010 that are still around, why was Hade Dragon Wu remade... as just a slightly chubbier, oilier and messier version of the old splash? It looked absolutely fine, it feels like a complete waste of time.
Why, they already got your money, fam
You know a skin that costs so much RP but looks extremely outdated won't sell that wel anymore,so it would be also in Riots interest to update them eventually.
Well I actually find Nunu Bot to still be a great skin. "Delicious." The question is things like Red Baron Cprki are not updated.
